title: Refraction, surface tension, and speed of sound: Refractive index (Na D-line)

ref.full: Koller, T.; Rausch, M. H.; Schulz, P. S.; Berger, M.; Wasserscheid, P.; Economou, I. G.; Leipertz, A.; Froba, A. P. (2012) J. Chem. Eng. Data 57(3), 828-835.
ref.title: Viscosity, Interfacial Tension, Self-Diffusion Coefficient, Density, and Refractive Index of the Ionic Liquid 1-Ethyl-3-methylimidazolium Tetracyanoborate as a Function of Temperature at Atmospheric Pressure
